General.Name: Summer Energy Holdings Inc
General.Description: Summer Energy Holdings, Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates as a retail electric provider in Texas, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Ohio, and Illinois. It procures wholesale energy and resells to commercial and residential customers. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 5847 San Felipe Street, Houston, TX, United States, 77057
